member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ToolBarMode
member.summary: Represents different modes of toolbar.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ToolBarMode.Default
member.summary: Default. It displays all the buttons in the toolbar.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ToolBarMode.Navigation
member.summary: Mini. Mini toolbar mode allows to view toolbar with four navigation arrows namely First, Previous, Next and Last along with current page number and total pages.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ToolBarMode.FullNavigation
member.summary: Micro. Micro toolbar mode allows to view toolbar with two navigation arrows namely previous and next.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ViewMode
member.summary: Represents different view mode of Report Viewer.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ViewMode.Normal
member.summary: Default. It will display the reports in Normal Mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ViewMode.Print
member.summary: Default. It will display the reports in Print Mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ProcessingMode.Remote
member.summary: Representing the reports render in Remote mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.ProcessingMode.Local
member.summary: Representing the reports render in Local mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.PrintColorMode.Color
member.summary: Representing the Color mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.PrintColorMode.GrayScale
member.summary: Representing the GrayScale mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.PaperOrientation.Portrait
member.summary: Representing the Paper Orientation option as Portrait.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Reports.Viewer.PaperOrientation.Landscape
member.summary: Representing the Paper Orientation option as Landscape.
